title: Edmonton Oilers ' revenue 2005 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006/07 to 2007/08, and lastly roughly constant from 2007/08 to 2008/09.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006/07 and 2007/08.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 85.0 was reported at Year 2007/08
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 71.0 was reported at Year 2006/07
